summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 315 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1895 m), feels like temperature (up 2.0°C), outside temperature (up 2.4°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 751.5m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and calm and still conditions are expected. Some rain can be expected, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
